Openstack eLab

Lab 6 Working with Bugs


Run your own host and try it!

How to log in your hosts?

Open your terminal, and type:
"ssh username@hostIP"
And input the password.

Host 1:

  • Host 1 IP: 10.241.1.100

  • Username: ubuntu

  • Password: oci123

  • Host 2 IP: 10.241.1.101

  • Username: ubuntu

  • Password: oci123

Host 3:

  • Username: ubuntu

  • Password: oci123
